scripts.setup: cp auraapp-chatbot/.env.example auraapp-chatbot/.env && echo 'Please edit .env file with your AWS credentials'
scripts.test-connection: cd auraapp-chatbot && node -e "require('dotenv').config(); require('./config/awsConfig').testConnections().then(() => console.log('✅ All connections working')).catch(e => console.error('❌ Connection failed:', e.message))"
